quotes.quote: People are hungry for what's happening right now in the world.
Hungry men have no respect for law, authority or human life.
A hungry people listens not to reason, not cares for justice, nor is bent by any prayers.
Hungry man, reach for the book: it is a weapon.
Hungry people cannot be good at learning or producing anything, except perhaps violence.
Rice is great if you're really hungry and want to eat two thousand of something.
When hope is hungry, everything feeds it.
Eat only when you are hungry. Drink only when you're thirsty. Sleep only when you're tired. Screw only when you're horny.
A hungry man is an angry one.
A hungry man can't see right or wrong. He just sees food.
People are hungry for messages of hope and life.
A hungry stomach cannot hear.
Even the rich are hungry for love, for being cared for, for being wanted, for having someone to call their own.
We are hungry for things that have touched human hands.
To a hungry person, every bitter food is sweet. When the preferable is not available, the available becomes preferable!
A hungry stomach rarely despises common food.
Some people prefer eating dessert to the main course. These people have never been really hungry.
Stay hungry. Stay foolish. Never let go of your appetite to go after new ideas, new experiences, and new adventures.
If you want to eat when you're not hungry, you're hungry for something else.
Only a stomach that rarely feels hungry scorns common things.
Living on hope is like being hungry all the time.
If you're hungry enough even poison tastes good.
Being hungry is like being in love: if you don't know, you're probably not.
People are not hungry just for bread, they are hungry for love.
Nobody wants to kiss when they are hungry.
You're hungry for the infinite and the infinite is hungry for you.
The hungry feeling and the lonely feeling merged until it was hard to tell them apart.
Young players are more hungry because they have not achieved what some of the older players have.
We are all hungry and thirsty for concrete images. Abstract art will have been good for one thing: to restore its exact virginity to figurative art.
People are hungry because they're eating empty foods. Mine are full, and so am i.
People don't speak of hunger when they know what it is to be hungry.
If my children were hungry I should think I would steal to feed them.
Wait until you are hungry to say something, until there is an aching in you to speak.
It was not that she expected anything expensive; it was that he needed to give her something as much as he needed to eat when he was hungry.
People are hungry for stories of faith. People are hungry for hope.
In all of nature, there is no sound more pleasing than that of a hungry animal at its feed. Unless you are the food.
Humans are the only hunters who kill when not hungry
Children are the most learning-hungry beings in the world.
As long as one human being is hungry, the entire human race is hungry.
Stay hungry, stay healthy, be a gentleman, believe strongly in yourself and go beyond limitations.
If I were hungry and friendless today, I would rather take my chances with a saloon-keeper than with the average preacher.
Eat every meal as if it's your last; when the last one comes, you probably won't be very hungry.
A hungry wolf at all the herd will run, In hopes, through many, to make sure of one.
When hungry, eat your rice; when tired, close your eyes. Fools may laugh at me, but wise men will know what I mean.
